Hi St.Ack / Michael Hansen ,

As per as my limited experience with winxp an=
d Heritrix 1.4.0, it doesn't take default profiles from jar file. This work=
s fine with linux box. This might be some file separator character problem.=
 You need to copy profiles directory from source zip to conf directory.

Th=
is has solved the problem in my winxp trial.

Thanks,
Subramanya C R

  Michael Hansen wrote:

  > The only thin=
g I did was to:
  >
  > * Login into the web admin.
  > * Create a new job =
based on the default template
  > * Settings / change 'user agent', and 'fr=
om' fields
  > * Submit the job.
  >
  Ok.  You did nothing out-of-the-ordi=
nary.

  > I just tried it again to be sure. Same exception is thrown.
  >
=
  > A cross platform issue perhaps? (winxp at my end - linux at your end, 
=
  > right?).

  Thats what I'd look at next only I have no winxp box on my =
end.  Would 
  be great if you could figure what we're doing wrong for winx=
p and could 
  submit a patch.

  Thanks,
  St.Ack

<DIV><FONT face=3D"Courier New">=

with winxp and Heritrix 1.4.0, i=
t doesn't take default profiles from jar 
file. This works fine with linux =
box. This might be some file separator 
character problem. You ne=
ed to copy profiles directory from 
source zip to conf directory.=
</FONT></DIV>

trial.</FON=
